005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008public interface IContainer {
009  /**
010   * Identifies if the container allows child instances or not.
011   * <p>
012   * This can be the case if the container has flags or a complex model with at
013   * least a choice, choice group, field, or assembly instance.
014   *
015   * @return {@code true} if there are flags or a model, or {@code false}
016   *         otherwise
017   */
018  boolean hasChildren();
019}
